comment: She teaches exactly what she sets out to teach. If you question her midthought, you will not get a clear answer, but if you wait until she has explained something thoroughly and is just about to move on to ask your question, then you will get a rather good answer. Also, reading the book is imperative. Overall, a fun and informative class.

Worst college professor I've ever had. Rambles a ton, examples not relevant to exams, and insults you if you forget algebra formulas. She's a hs professor too, cares very little for college job obviously.
